text: Charles Graham "Chuck" Boyd (April 15, 1938 – March 23, 2022) was a general of the United States Air Force. Boyd was a pilot who served in Vietnam and is the only Vietnam War prisoner of war (1966–1973) to reach the four-star rank (1992). Boyd supported former Vice President Joe Biden for president in the 2020 election, the first candidate he had publicly ever endorsed.https://www.washingtonpost.com/national-security/nearly-500-former- senior-military-civilian-leaders-signal-support-for- biden/2020/09/23/81196288-fdf9-11ea-9ceb-061d646d9c67_story.html Boyd died at the age of 83 on March 23, 2022 from lung cancer in Haymarket, Virginia.Charles G. Boyd, Air Force general and former POW, dies at 83 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Prisoners of war Category:American aviators Category:Military people from Iowa Category:Deaths from lung cancer
title: Charles G. Boyd
